course_title: Spec. Tops in Sociology: Sociology of Emotions
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: This course will be an introduction to the way that sociologists use emotion in theory and practice. It will examine the connection between emotion and other social categories and/or institutions such as race, gender, class, the workplace, and social movements.
course_description: A seminar or lecture series on topics of special sociological concern.
sections: Class Nbr: 2473, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: O. Johnson, Status: Open
